survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to improve service quality, safety, and user experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover all typical usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What are your primary reasons for using electric scooter sharing services? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction rating. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest to enhance the electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety issues while using the service?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to gauge safety concerns. Follow-up question (Q5a) can be routed based on response.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety issues while using the service?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety issue you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended follow-up for respondents who reported safety issues. Useful for identifying common problems.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open text (OPEN_TEXT). Add routing to show only if Q5 is 'Yes'.

script.question_text: Please describe the safety issue you encountered.
